Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2024

Information We Collect

CostFlowAI is a static website that provides construction cost estimation tools. We collect minimal information:

  • Calculation Data: The calculations you perform are processed locally in your browser and are not stored on our servers.
  • Analytics: We may use Google Analytics 4 to understand website usage patterns. This includes anonymous data about page visits and user interactions.
  • Technical Data: Standard web server logs including IP addresses, browser type, and referral sources.

How We Use Information

  • To provide and improve our cost estimation tools
  • To understand how visitors use our website
  • To maintain website security and functionality

Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We do not share your calculation data with anyone.

Cookies

Our website may use cookies for:

  • Analytics purposes (if Google Analytics is enabled)
  • Remembering your preferences

You can control cookies through your browser settings.

Data Security

All calculations are performed locally in your browser. We implement appropriate security measures to protect any data we do collect.

Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Know what personal information we collect
  • Request deletion of your personal information
  • Opt out of analytics tracking

Contact Information

For privacy-related questions, please contact us at: privacy@costflowai.com

Changes to This Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
